properties.title: Rosenlaui Glacier GorgeÂ
properties.abstract: On the way from Meiringen to Grosse Scheidegg you can discover a real natural jewel: From a good secured path you feel the awesome power of the water running through the Rosenlaui Glacier Gorge.
properties.description:
For thousands of years, water has formed a fantastic work of art out of solid rock. Enjoy the walk on a good, gradually ascending path through the beautiful gorge. Pass by waterfalls, natural whirlpools and fantastically shaped rocks. All the way up, you will feel the breath-taking power of the glacial water running through the gorge: A truly natural experience. At the end of the gorge a forest trail leads you back to the entry point

The Rosenlaui Glacier Gorge is situated 10 kilometres from Meiringen on the way to Grosse Scheidegg and Grindelwald. The round-trip takes about 45 minutes, the length of the gorge is 600 metres and the difference in altitude 115 metres. It is daily opened from end of May to mid-October. The visit of the gorge is suitable for all pedestrians.
properties.name: Gletscherschlucht Rosenlaui
